mcscript.data.predicates package¶

Submodules¶

mcscript.data.predicates.BiomePredicate module¶

class mcscript.data.predicates.BiomePredicate.BiomePredicate¶

Bases: mcscript.data.predicates.predicateGenerator.PredicateGenerator

generates predicates to identify each biome in minecraft (biomes are read from config/biome_list_path)

generate(fileStructure: mcscript.utils.FileStructure.FileStructure) → Tuple[str, …]¶

Generates the predicate files in the fileStructure object. :param fileStructure: the FileStructure :return: a list of the names of the predicate functions, without extension

mcscript.data.predicates.FeaturePredicate module¶

class mcscript.data.predicates.FeaturePredicate.FeaturePredicate¶

Bases: mcscript.data.predicates.predicateGenerator.PredicateGenerator

generate(fileStructure: mcscript.utils.FileStructure.FileStructure) → Dict[mcscript.data.minecraftData.features.Feature, str]¶

Generates the predicate files in the fileStructure object. :param fileStructure: the FileStructure :return: a list of the names of the predicate functions, without extension

mcscript.data.predicates.LightPredicate module¶

class mcscript.data.predicates.LightPredicate.LightPredicate¶

Bases: mcscript.data.predicates.predicateGenerator.PredicateGenerator

Generates Predicates to test for the light level. This is done by a simple linear search (so that only one function file is necessary)

generate(fileStructure: mcscript.utils.FileStructure.FileStructure) → Tuple[str, …]¶

Generates the predicate files in the fileStructure object. :param fileStructure: the FileStructure :return: a list of the names of the predicate functions, without extension

mcscript.data.predicates.RandomChancePredicate module¶

class mcscript.data.predicates.RandomChancePredicate.RandomChancePredicate(chance: float)¶

Bases: mcscript.data.predicates.predicateGenerator.PredicateGenerator

This default dynamic predicates that return true with a custom chance.

generate(fileStructure: mcscript.utils.FileStructure.FileStructure) → Tuple[str, …]¶

Generates the predicate files in the fileStructure object. :param fileStructure: the FileStructure :return: a list of the names of the predicate functions, without extension

mcscript.data.predicates.predicateGenerator module¶

class mcscript.data.predicates.predicateGenerator.PredicateGenerator¶

Bases: abc.ABC

base class for predicate generators.

Generates the predicate files in the fileStructure object. :param fileStructure: the FileStructure :return: a list of the names of the predicate functions, without extension
